title: 台湾的大大皮肤曝光
author: DE国小新
txt_content:
Engilsh:
Hello Hello everyone, I have come to tell you publish a skin
Taiwan is very famous live group, the one that is InkFan Xiaoqiang good ink.
Details see pictures
中文翻译：
哈罗大家好，我这次来给大家发布个皮肤
就是台湾非常著名的实况组，的一员InkFan也就是墨善小强。

详情请看图片




Engilsh:
Skin probably like this. Want to skin it? Want to quickly reply to it, the party refused to hand Oh!
中文翻译:
皮肤大概就是这个样子。想要皮肤吗？想要就快点回复吧，拒绝伸手党哦！
不回复必须给人气
http://yun.baidu.com/s/1sjHh3fn前5L有人气,金立奖励哦



[groupid=334]现代风格建筑团队[/groupid]

replies.txt_content: e...感觉和普通的皮肤没有太大的区别

replies.txt_content:
